channel.title: Anyone ever used installcreator by clickteam.com?
channel.description: well, i was using it to make installation for my new client, so when it was done, a few people downloaded it, jotti scanned it, and said it had a virus. i dont put viruses into my programs, so i wanted to see what was causing it. i jotti scanned my installer, and sure enough, there was the downloader. then i individually scanned all of the files and programs that i had stuck into the installer to install, and they are all clean. im just wondering if anyone else has had any problems with installcreator free version from clickteam.

item.title: Anyone ever used installcreator by clickteam.com?
item.dc:creator: @Dodian Dodian
item.description:
@Dodian wrote:

Use installshield

Read full topic

item.title: Anyone ever used installcreator by clickteam.com?
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

I have a program that turns bat files and jar's into Executables. Exe4j is what it's called I think. If that's what you're looking for.

item.title: Anyone ever used installcreator by clickteam.com?
item.dc:creator: @Cheaphack101 Cheaphack101
item.description:
@Cheaphack101 wrote:

everything i have found on google you have to pay for, but im deffanatly not using clickteam anymore. ill search around a bit more for some other good install program, but i could probably find a custom made one on pscode or something.

Read full topic
item.source: Anyone ever used installcreator by clickteam.com?

item.title: Anyone ever used installcreator by clickteam.com?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

SomethingToHide:

Jotti is not always right. What viruses did it say? Post here and we can check it out. It might think it's a virus because it installs programs, or does it use the net to download your client and install?

There is a thread in the 3rd party programs called ancient scape with the viruses it had.

Anyways, there are other solutions you can use for installation files. Strangly I cannot think of any, but search google?

Read full topic
item.source: Anyone ever used installcreator by clickteam.com?
